TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1462-1463
TEI.2.document_title: George Orr to Stephen F. Austin, 09-28-1826

barker_notes.barker_summary: George Orr to Austin, September 28, 1826. Asking for titles to land.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1462-1463

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*George Orr to Austin, September 28, 1826. Asking for titles to land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Atascosito */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="09-28-1826">Sept. 28th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*Accompanying this to yourself we transmit a letter to *person_mentioned*His Excellency the Chief of the Department*/person_mentioned* with a statement of the votes of the *person_mentioned*Inhabitants */person_mentioned*respecting our being attached to your *location_mentioned*Colony */location_mentioned*or to *location_mentioned*Nacogdoches*/location_mentioned*—the letter to his *person_mentioned*Excellency */person_mentioned*is unsealed—you can open it and having read it you will please to seal and forward it—As we are now to be under your wing we hope you will find it convenient to call on us with the *person_mentioned*commissioner */person_mentioned*and put us quickly in a way to know where our *location_mentioned*lands */location_mentioned*are, what shall be the form of our *location_mentioned*sitios */location_mentioned*where shall be situated our new *location_mentioned*Town */location_mentioned*etc. etc. At all events we shall be grievously disappointed if the *person_mentioned*commissioner */person_mentioned*does not visit us and set us to rights—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*George Ore*/person_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Henry W. Munson*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*To *person_mentioned*Col. Stephen F. Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*St. Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
